name: playwright
description: Installation steps 1.  Install latest nodeJS      https://nodejs.org/en/download/ 2.  Install Visual studio code     https://code.visualstudio.com/Download 3.  Open VS code  4.  Clone repo from  https://github.com/sumeet6181/PlaywrightCucumberAssignment.git 4.  Open terminal and Run command "npm install" 5.  Then execute command "npx playwright install"
